Tagging

Collab implements its own version of taggit.

Taggit

Taggit is a reusable django app that allows developers to add tagging capabilities to their project. It provides functionality to tag objects as well as querying them by tag name.

Customization

All the basic functions are there, but a tag_category was added. Tags can be added to multiple objects and you can retrieve them by category.

For example you can have the same tag "travel" for both a Person and a Document. You can use a "person" and a "document" tag_category to differentiate them.

How to use it

To add tags you can use the add_tags helper:

from core.taggit.utils import add_tags
add_tags(person, tag, category_slug, req.user, 'person')
